• ABySS 2.0, Tigmint, ARKS, and Bloom Filters at RECOMB-Seq

    conference  · 19 Apr 2018
    RECOMB 2018 will be taking place in Paris, France, from April 21-24th.

    RECOMB-Seq is one of its four satellite workshops this year, taking place from April 19-20th, bringing together researchers in computational genomics and bioinformatics to discuss new frontiers in gene sequencing.
